pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Pacific Power and Radio Program Scripts
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes scripts of Stories of Pacific Powerland, a five minute program sponsored by Pacific Power and Light Co. All 1,273 programs were narrated by Nelson Olmsted. Each program dealt with Western history, biography or folklore.
